question.questionText: What is true about the Web Server
question.a: It sends requests to retrieve information files
question.b: It is a physical room of people who receive data and finds it
question.c: It is not a part of web systems
question.d: It receives requests for information and data

question.questionText: What are the three tiers in order from bottom tier to top tier in a Web System?
What does the head element used for?
question.a: The content of the web page (ie. images, text, headings)
question.b: The title, encoding, and css linking
question.c: All headings of the document go here
question.d: Specifies what elements have been used in the document

question.questionText: Are URIs the same as URLs? Why?
question.a: No, they are synonyms of each other
question.b: Yes, URIs are a special type of URL
question.c: Yes, URLs are a special type of URI
question.d: Yes, URIs are integer based and URLs are long int based
